law.catch_line: Notwithstanding any other law and subject to § 7-203 of this subtitle, a warrant of execution shall...
law.text:
Notwithstanding any other law and subject to § 7-203 of this subtitle, a warrant of execution shall be stayed for 210 days after:
the Supreme Court of the United States passes an order denying any petition for a writ of certiorari;
the Supreme Court of the United States makes a decision affirming the sentence of death; or
if no review is sought, the time for seeking review by the Supreme Court of the United States expires.
